title: India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard

text: February 10, 2018 / 8:06 PM / Updated an hour ago India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Feb 10 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 4th odi between South Africa and India on Saturday at Johannesburg, South Africa South Africa win by 5 wickets (DLS Method) India 1st innings Rohit Sharma c&b Kagiso Rabada 5 Shikhar Dhawan c AB de Villiers b Morne Morkel 109 Virat Kohli c David Miller b Chris Morris 75 Ajinkya Rahane c Kagiso Rabada b Lungi Ngidi 8 Shreyas Iyer c Chris Morris b Lungi Ngidi 18 MS Dhoni Not Out 42 Hardik Pandya c Aiden Markram b Kagiso Rabada 9 Bhuvneshwar Kumar Run Out JP Duminy 5 Extras 0b 6lb 0nb 0pen 12w 18 Total (50.0 overs) 289-7 Fall of Wickets : 1-20 Sharma, 2-178 Kohli, 3-206 Dhawan, 4-210 Rahane, 5-247 Iyer, 6-262 Pandya, 7-282 Kumar Did Not Bat : Yadav, Bumrah, Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Morne Morkel 10 0 55 1 5.50 4w Kagiso Rabada 10 0 58 2 5.80 3w Lungi Ngidi 10 0 52 2 5.20 1w Chris Morris 10 0 60 1 6.00 2w Andile Phehlukwayo 6 0 38 0 6.33 2w JP Duminy 4 0 20 0 5.00 South Africa 1st innings Aiden Markram lbw Jasprit Bumrah 22 Hashim Amla c Bhuvneshwar Kumar b Kuldeep Yadav 33 JP Duminy lbw Kuldeep Yadav 10 AB de Villiers c Rohit Sharma b Hardik Pandya 26 David Miller lbw Yuzvendra Chahal 39 Heinrich Klaasen Not Out 43 Andile Phehlukwayo Not Out 23 Extras 0b 3lb 2nb 0pen 6w 11 Total (25.3 overs) 207-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-43 Markram, 2-67 Duminy, 3-77 Amla, 4-102 de Villiers, 5-174 Miller Did Not Bat : Morris, Rabada, Ngidi, Morkel Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Bhuvneshwar Kumar 4 0 27 0 6.75 Jasprit Bumrah 5 0 21 1 4.20 Kuldeep Yadav 6 0 51 2 8.50 1w Hardik Pandya 5 0 37 1 7.40 2w Yuzvendra Chahal 5.3 0 68 1 12.36 3w 2nb Umpire Aleem Dar Umpire Bongani Jele Video Ian Gould Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
